mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, username, realname, nickname, password, email, phone, address, join_date) values (#{member_id}, #{username}, #{realname}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone}, #{address}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where username = #{username}
select count(*) from member where nickname = #{nickname}
select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
select count(*) from member where phone = #{phone}
select username from member where email = #{emailOrPhone} OR phone = #{emailOrPhone}
select * from member where username = #{username} and realname = #{realname} and email = #{email} and phone = #{phone}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{newPassword} where username = #{username}
update member set password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, address = #{address} where username = #{username}
update member set member_status = 'kick', member_kick_comment = '탈퇴한 회원입니다.' where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into brand (brand_id, member_id, brandname, brand_number, brand_join_date, brand_status) values (#{brand_id}, #{member_id}, #{brandname}, #{brand_number}, sysdate, '검토 중')
mapper.select: select count(*) from brand where brand_number = #{brand_number}
mapper.update: update brand set brand_status = '승인' where brand_id = #{brand_id}
update member m set m.userauthor = 2 where m.member_id in ( select b.member_id from brand b where b.brand_id = #{brand_id} and b.member_id = m.member_id )
update brand set brand_status = '거절', brand_refusal_comment = #{brand_refusal_comment} where brand_id = #{brand_id}
update member m set m.userauthor = 1 where m.member_id in ( select b.member_id from brand b where b.brand_id = #{brand_id} and b.member_id = m.member_id )
mapper.select: select b.brand_id, b.brandname, b.brandlogo_url, b.brand_number, b.brandlicense_url, b.brand_status, b.brand_refusal_comment, b.brand_join_date, b.brand_update_date, m.username, m.realname from brand b join member m on b.member_id = m.member_id
